Webscrapping

Technology Used : Python,Django,Beautifulsoup

Github
Created a website that access the data from craigslist with the help of web scrapping and made UI to show the result for devoted to jobs, housing, for sale, items wanted, services, community service, gigs, résumés, and discussion forums.Python,Django,beautiful-soup and requests,bootstrap was used for this project
